#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int n,a,b,t,i;
	char s[100001];
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while (t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",s);
		a=b=0;
		for (i=0;s[i];i++)
		{
			if (s[i]==68)
				a++;
			else 
				b++;
			if (a>b)
			{
				printf("NO\n");
				break;
			}
		}
		if (a==b)
			printf("YES\n");
		if (a<b)
			printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
